quotes.text: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.text: If I find 10,000 ways something won't work, I haven't failed. I am not discouraged, because every wrong attempt discarded is another step forward.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: Never complain and never explain.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.text: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
quotes.author: Pauline Kael

quotes.text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.text: Meditate â€¦ do not delay, lest you later regret it.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: You yourself must strive. The Buddhas only point the way.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: A wise person should be urgently moved on occasions that make for urgency.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.text: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.text: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Should someone do good, let them do it again and again. They should develop this habit, for the accumulation of goodness brings joy.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.text: Everything comes to him who hustles while he waits.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.text: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Genius is one per cent inspiration, ninety-nine per cent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
quotes.author: Ken Venturi

quotes.text: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.text: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.text: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.text: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.text: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.text: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.text: Nobody will believe in you unless you believe in yourself.
quotes.author: Liberace

quotes.text: Ardently do today what must be done. Who knows? Tomorrow, death comes.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.text: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.text: People are not lazy. They simply have impotent goals - that is, goals that do not inspire them.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.text: Before you can inspire with emotion, you must be swamped with it yourself. Before you can move their tears, your own must flow. To convince them, you must yourself believe.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: If you do what you've always done, you'll get what you've always gotten.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Using the power of decision gives you the capacity to get past any excuse to change any and every part of your life in an instant.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: To effectively communicate, we must realize that we are all different in the way we perceive the world and use this understanding as a guide to our communication with others.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Whatever happens, take responsibility.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: You always succeed in producing a result.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: The way we communicate with others and with ourselves ultimately determines the quality of our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: When people are like each other they tend to like each other.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: If you want to achieve anything in this world, you have to get used to the idea that not everyone will like you.
quotes.author: Simon Sinek

quotes.text: I don't want to achieve immortality through my work... I want to achieve it through not dying.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.text: What we achieve inwardly will change outer reality.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.text: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.text: When your desires are strong enough you will appear to possess superhuman powers to achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are: Hard work, Stick-to-itiveness, and Common sense.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: Be not afraid of greatness: some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some have greatness thrust upon them.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.text: It is difficult to achieve a spirit of genuine cooperation as long as people remain indifferent to the feelings and happiness of others.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: If you set out to be liked, you would be prepared to compromise on anything at any time, and you would achieve nothing.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.text: A man may fulfil the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer and attempting a task he cannot achieve.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quotes.text: If you are going to achieve excellence in big things, you develop the habit in little matters. Excellence is not an exception; it is a prevailing attitude.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.text: Leaders aren't born they are made. And they are made just like anything else, through hard work. And that's the price we'll have to pay to achieve that goal, or any goal.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.text: If you're trying to achieve, there will be roadblocks. I've had them; everybody has had them. But obstacles don't have to stop you. If you run into a wall, don't turn around and give up. Figure out how to climb it, go through it, or work around it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: You are the only person on earth who can use your ability.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
